name: You and Me, or the 2nd Batallion
name_original: You and Me, or the 2nd Batallion
description:
A small experimental simulationist take on the space shooter genre with the intent of thematic expression through mechanics. Clunky and methodical gameplay, not too much bullet dodging or wave management. Made in Unity for a computer game development course I took as homework.

Also completely ripped off a line I liked from Disco Elysium.

  • LMB to shoot laser (you can't the the line).
  • RMB to shoot missiles.
  • Mouse to drag your spacecraft around.
